website_summaries.verdict: A countertop washer with an attractive design inside and out, but little functionality under the hood.
pros: A simple and quick setup makes the machine easy to install and use
It's got a sturdy but sleek design that fits well in small kitchen and apartment spaces, and it remains relatively quiet when in use
cons: Over time, many users complain of soap pods not fully dissolving, and dishes not being fully cleaned

customer_reviews.title: cleaning machine
customer_reviews.text: This thing works fantastic! For my first run I put it to the test with a casserole dish and some other things that had baked food on it. Baked on spaghetti sauce was gone without a trace. It took me a bit to figure out how to hook it up, the kitchen faucet didn't have the threading but once I got it hooked up it was very easy. It was so easy to get started I thought I was doing something wrong. It's not very loud either which is nice! I highly recommend this dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Fehr

customer_reviews.title: Immediately ran a load of dishes after hooking up the hoses and everything came out great. I’ve had another brand before and the configuration ...
customer_reviews.text: Set up was a breeze, 5-10 minutes total. They also package this thing in a serious manner, there were wood slats in the box keeping things secure. Immediately ran a load of dishes after hooking up the hoses and everything came out great. I’ve had another brand before and the configuration of the dish rack in this one is superior, it allowed me to get 3 days of dishes in the machine without any fuss. (Household of two).
customer_reviews.author: Dylan H

customer_reviews.title: So cool!
customer_reviews.text: My grandmother has never had a dishwasher... She had always been in the kitchen hand washing dishes, especially during the holidays. We always tried helping her but she never wanted us to miss out on spending time with family. She was so excited to receive this for her 81st birthday. It was easy for my husband to install and works well. I recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: DesireeTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Stop working properly after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: First 2 months it was really good and our dishes were getting cleaned. Then suddenly, we started to see stains left on the dishes and tried multiple runs on same dishes so that they can get cleaned. And after couple of weeks, it got worse and even multiple runs did not solve the issue. Basically it stops resolving the cleaner (we tried tablets, powder, liquid cleaner) from the dispenser. I took this pic this morning after 2x longest program run and 2 tablets are almost never dispensed and so the dishes were terrible! So I am not sure what the problem is but I do not recommend this product if you are planning to use it more than 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: emir

customer_reviews.title: Plastic thin, Heavy Leaking.
customer_reviews.text: It worked for 3 months then it started heavy leaking from everywhere. The plastic housing and seals did not last long. Some spots were so thin light passed right through. Simple fixes did nothing to stop the heavy leaking. The interior was to thin to handle the work. Did not always get dishes clean on one cycle. I can not recommend this product to others.
customer_reviews.author: Ryu Ryujin Master

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to surprise my fiance with this, for Christmas. I gave it to her early, so we could immediately benefit from it. I have to say, it's so worth the money. I was expecting it to be a lot louder. You can barely hear it actually washing. The only time you really hear it is when it's pumping water in, or out. Thee only thing that sticks out in my mind is the time it takes for it to finish. Maybe I'm just too eager to take a look at all the shiny dishes that were cleaned without me having to lift a finger (besides loading lol). Great buy. I hope it lasts a year or two minimum.
customer_reviews.author: Jonny Guns

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small spaces!
customer_reviews.text: Quality seems really high. It is basically the same as a full size dishwasher, just with one drawer. It came with a hose to hook it up to faucet, but since I took it to work we had an adapter purchased to split it to the water line and use it that way. Now we don't have to worry about running the faucet while it is running. The president of my company allowed us to have it in our kitchenette/break room for employees. Everybody loves it and finds it extremely helpful instead of having to hand wash all the dishes.
customer_reviews.author: Mel Point

customer_reviews.title: Great Countertop Dishwasher!
customer_reviews.text: I work for a German Appliance Mfr and have been in the appliance business for 30 years. I needed a countertop DW, and my company does not make one. I researched and bought the hOmelabs compact. Bottom line: this thing ROCKS! It is a great cleaner and dryer. It is amazingly quiet. With proper positioning, my 10.25” plates fit with room to spare. Dishes come out clean. Much easier to install than the directions describe. The quick-connect hoses make it ridiculously easy, but note, the directions have not caught up with the assembly provided. The assembly is so easy! Just make sure your faucet has a threaded end. Great machine. Easy to install. Mine is on a rolling cart. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Tucson Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Faulty product
customer_reviews.text: I'm so upset. The unit didn't match the size listed so it didn't fit in my space, the manual is mislabeled on a couple pages, plus the hoses were completely wrong. The drain hose was connected to the top male connector on the quick connect and the inlet hose was connected to the bottom. These connectors have different sizes so I couldn't just switch them. I called customer service and she suggested I buy the correct hoses and she would reimburse me for the purchase. No. I shouldn't have to do that. So I'm returning the unit.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted to like this dishwasher when bought it based on the great ...
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this dishwasher when bought it based on the great reviews all the buyers. It has been on for hours with the glass symbol flashing constantly, no matter what I press I cannot get it to pause or to go into another cycle. I am really frustrated and disappointed. I have read through all the reviews and cannot figure out why this machine has caused me so much grief. This is the exact problem another customer reported. Any useful links?
customer_reviews.author: Arush

customer_reviews.title: Great little machine
customer_reviews.text: Our full-size dishwasher broke, and COVID-19 hit, and suddenly we were handwashing twice the normal amount of dishes. Enter this countertop dishwasher on an emergency basis. Don't expect to put a whole Thanksgiving feast for extended family in here - it's best with smaller plates. That said, it does an *excellent* job getting everything clean, and an entirely decent job getting things dry (glass/ceramic/wood gets plenty dry; plastic stuff tends to need a drip dry afterwards still). Seems sturdy, well built, and it's plenty quiet to leave going after bedtime.
customer_reviews.author: ceejayoz

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I loved this at first.... but after only one month, it has given me issues. The glassware light stays blinking and won’t stop. I talked to the customer service and all I had to do was tilt the left side of the unit up 4-6 inches. There was a plug stuck. Haven’t had issues since. But!!! Make sure if this happens to have a towel handy.... water will pour onto your floor.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith De Merritt

customer_reviews.title: NIGHTMARE APPLIANCE !!! RETURNED
customer_reviews.text: First and foremost Instructions are only to set it up and install. then you have to figure out on your own how does it work, I mean not even letting you know how the cycle works, how to turn it on off, troubleshooting ZERO/NADA, tried going to the website even youtube, fought for almost 3 weeks to make it work, never went to a complete cycle, had to remove water by hand, AWFUL!!! I was so happy when I got it but only gave me disappointment and wasted hours of my time trying to make it work !!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Story Teller

customer_reviews.title: Really Disappointed & Frustrated
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this dishwasher & bought it based on the high marks from all the buyers. I have spent hours and hours trying to get it hooked up without leaking into the sink and to get it to work period. It has been on for hours with the glass symbol flashing constantly, no matter what I press I cannot get it to pause or to go into another cycle. I am really frustrated and disappointed. I have read through all the reviews and cannot figure out why this machine has caused me so much grief.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemarie

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit any faucets. Can’t hook it up.
customer_reviews.text: Product is MUCH bigger than it looks in these deceiving pictures. It also comes with “attachments” thst literally don’t fit any faucets or nozzles in America. No Home Depot or Lowe’s even had fittings that would fit the weird threads on the nozzles. Such a disappointment. I tried to return it and they said they’re shipping me new nozzles no tracking or info on what they’re even sending, just that it’s coming in 3-7 business days, it’s been 4 days and nothing yet just a giant hunk of metal taking up half my kitchen. Has been so stressful when I was so excited to get this to relieve some stress of having to do dishes!
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy. - Very Very Quiet
customer_reviews.text: Don't read too much into my improvement comments. I love my dishwasher! Oh, and it really is almost silent. The only problem with the dishwasher is, it is larger than I envisioned. It does not really fit on my RV countertop. The hoses could be a little longer since I had to put it on a cart. Not to worry, I converted my bookcase into a rolling cart, which works out perfectly...
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Works great-Dont be afraid to Hard Wired for a Small Kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to hardwire this to water line and disposer drain- the connection in the back for water supply is adaptable to a brass dishwasher connection available thru Amazon (add a second rubber washer to prevent leaks). Use a standard 3/8 " to 3/8" dishwasher water hose! Cut the drain hose and install a disposer drain adapter using a hose clamp. Works like a charm! Installed in an IKEA cabinet like another user review! Checked back for leaks a few times and no drips! Great quality dishwasher and dishes come out sparkling! Called customer service for help and they were great- helped with connection sizes. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Humberto Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Does what it's supposed to do
customer_reviews.text: Very good dishwasher for the price. It arrived in perfect condition and only took a few minutes to hook up and get started. Yes, it is small. That is what the description says. It is perfect for my husband and me. We don't have to rinse off the dishes before loading them in the dishwasher. It is quieter than most dishwashers. The only problem we have ever had is that some of the dishes were not completely dry afterward. We solved that issue by opening the door slightly after it shuts off and letting them air dry.
customer_reviews.author: lindaj

customer_reviews.title: This is such a great product to have if you don't have a dishwasher
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great product to have if you don't have a dishwasher! Fits on the counter and works great! I can't believe how many dishes can fit in each load. Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Townson

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it.
customer_reviews.text: It's super easy to install. Literally just 3 hoses; one to let water into the machine, one to let water out of the machine and one to connect to the faucet. Once you figure out which hose goes where you'll be good to go. It is easy to use, it does a good job of washing dishes and it's not loud at all. Do yourself the favor and just buy it already.
customer_reviews.author: Evaristo

customer_reviews.title: Compact and clean
customer_reviews.text: I thoroughly enjoy my dishwasher, the first one had a leak/didn't drain so water ran everywhere. I called customer service at hOmeLabs and they replaced it for free. I have since enjoyed a working one, it was easy to install and use. I make sure to "prewash" my dishes to keep it in good working order so it doesn't get clogged with food. Has to have the clean rinse liquid otherwise things come out very spotty and almost crusty with soap but with the right stuff everything looks great and is nice and clean! I would totally recommend it. It is noisy but most dishwashers are. Not a big deterrent in my book.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal

customer_reviews.title: Leaks Water
customer_reviews.text: update: 4/17/19. I have had the product for about a month and it was working fine. It is now leaking water out of the bottom and I am returning the product.
customer_reviews.author: Alex H

customer_reviews.title: Cannot live without this!
customer_reviews.text: Why did I wait 10 years to buy one? This has changed my life forever! It performs just as well as a built in model and it has taken so much work and stress from our household. We are enjoying more at home meals, bought real ceramic dinnerware and are enjoying a cleaner kitchen. It sits on a kitchen cart and hasn’t really interfered with our small kitchen dynamics. It’s an essential household item, for two ppl it works well. I can fit so much in and you learn fast how to load it to maximize for the largest/fullest loads.
customer_reviews.author: Will Marshall

customer_reviews.title: I'm seriously so glad I purchased this
customer_reviews.text: This dishwasher has made things so much easier for me. We've been staying in a house that doesn't have a dishwasher and doesn't have hookups for a dishwasher. Our house is also a rental so we can't have one installed. Hand washing dishes isn't by any means hard, but it is time consuming. I'm seriously so glad I purchased this. It works great, my dishes fit in it, everything comes out clean even with things baked on. It fits perfectly on my counter near my sink and it was incredibly easy to setup. If you're on the fence about buying it, just buy it, trust me it's made things exponentially easier for me.
customer_reviews.author: Kass

customer_reviews.title: Life changer!
customer_reviews.text: I have not had a dishwasher in years and I realized that I spend way too much time washing dishes by hand so I decided to buy this dishwasher and it changed my life! I love this product! IT Was super easy to instal took about 10 minutes in total and it can fit a decent amount of dishes and silverware (Works for our family of 4) and it does a great job cleaning. This machine is quiet as ever except when it drains it can be a bit loud but it drains fast enough that it’s not completely noisy overall it works great and I’m super happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Pam A.

customer_reviews.title: Plastic fittings and leaks like a sieve, in one day.
customer_reviews.text: Unboxed this washer, hooked it up(all fittings are cheap plastic) and everything was good for exactly one run then it started leaking at the base of the water inlet, not the fitting, internally. Do not buy pressured water appliances with plastic fittings. Fitting sizes also seem to be proprietary threading since I couldn't find anything to fit them. Pipe thread, hose thread, compression thread, nothing fit right for drain.
customer_reviews.author: Posey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect dishwasher
customer_reviews.text: Perfect little dishwasher! We live in an old house that doesn't have room for a dishwasher. With an old baby and young toddler, this of course was on my wish list. Works really well! Use it 2-3 times a day. Our counters are too small to set it on but we are going to buy a cart for when we need it. Only difficult thing is trying to get some dishes to fit. It needed to be just a little taller or maybe we have bigger dishes. We get them to fit but they have to be at an angel. Update: fittings don't work super well and now it's just sitting
customer_reviews.author: MH

customer_reviews.title: My favorite Amazon purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is the greatest thing I have ever bought. I hated doing dishes so I bought this. It cleans everything perfectly, I've never had a problem (knock on wood). The only thing it didn't clean was some stubborn built on eggs.. but I easily used the faucet hose to take out the eggs again, then popped it back in and it cleaned it. Super easy to set up and is ready to wash in seconds. Something satisfying about putting in really dirty dishes and having them come out clean in just 2 hours. I love my dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Sean S.

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT fit dinner plates
customer_reviews.text: We have the world's most basic white dinner plates. Seriously nothing fancy or giant. And they do not fit. The diagram in the manual shows just how you get 6 place settings in. I was so psyched when I was reading through it, thinking how this was going to change my life. Then the first dish I went to put in was a plate. No matter how much we tilted it, my husband and I could not get it to fit. What a letdown. I guess we'll either return it or eat off of salad plates for the duration of our kitchen reno.
customer_reviews.author: I&D

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: The dishwasher is bigger than I expected, but that's my fault for not paying attention to the measurements. Overall, it does a great job. My dishes are clean, although they don't dry all the way. It does recommend rinse aid so I'll pick some up and see if that helps but I don't mind leaving the door open and waiting for the dishes to air dry. I wish the hoses were a little longer too. Besides that though I love it. It takes two hours for a wash and it holds more than you would think. It's perfect for my small apartment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best graduation present. Ever.
customer_reviews.text: I despise washing dishes. It is completely illogical, and there are other household chores that take far more effort but irritate me so much less. I got this washer as a graduation present a few months ago and after figuring out how to connect it to my kitchen faucet (which was complicated by the faucet itself, not the connectors provided with the washer), it has been smooth sailing with no leaks or malfunctions. It's obviously not going to be the same has having a really expensive, full-size dishwasher, but for the price, it does an incredible job and has made me so much more enthusiastic about cooking after a long day at work. 100% recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Harmony

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for historic apartments!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. Fits a lot of dishes and easy to set up and use. It is kinda large, but don’t see how it could be any smaller with still being useful. Totally worth losing the counter space to be able to have sparking clean and sanitized dishes. Pro tip:I had a kink in the drain hose and this makes the glass symbol flash and beep. I fixed it and the product drained but was still stuck on the icon flashing and beeping, even after turning off and unplugging. Nothing in the manual mentioned this. I tilted the unit back at 45 degree angle and more water came out. This fixed it and started working fine again!
customer_reviews.author: bkrie1207

customer_reviews.title: Please help!
customer_reviews.text: We are very happy with this purchase- however we would love to discover a solution to the normal faucet adapter... the adapter that came with this works great but when you want to return the sink faucet to normal use, you have to unscrew the adapter or live with the violent and uncontrollable water spewing out of the adapter. Don’t they make one you can attach that arriates the water?? Does this make sense? We need an adapter that slips on easy when we do dishes by hand...
customer_reviews.author: S. Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: Great stand-by system
customer_reviews.text: I bought it because there was no way I could either fix the ailing dishwasher or replace it. It is noisy for sure, when running. Help from the company is poor, in fact they just repeat what appear on the FAQ's, I ran into some issues with the plumbing. Also, don't be fooled by the fact it says it is counter-top. These products are easy to install (no doubt), but they occupy a large amount of counter-top space. Since the time I purchased it to the time this review appears, the old dishwasher was finally replaced. This is now on a standby mode, though we doubt it will be used that often. But, it worked as a good replacement.
customer_reviews.author: DevB

customer_reviews.title: This machine is mind blowing impressive
customer_reviews.text: This is better than any full size I’ve used to date. When I was using it there was no dish stack up in the sink and the dishes were so clean and actually dry. Love this so much that when we move this summer it has earned a spot in our travel trailer.
customer_reviews.author: J Moochie

customer_reviews.title: Nice dishwasher, 1st unit defective.
customer_reviews.text: The dishwasher worked great, quiet running, dishes cleaned well, I thought it was unclear how to tell when it is done washing however after 2 weeks this unit stopped working at all. If you turn it on it would run the drain pump for a min or two, beep for 30 sec or so and then stop and the glass light would flash constantly. The filter was clean. I called the manufacturer and after a short diagnosis they are sending us new one free of charge. I hope the 2nd unit proves more reliable.
customer_reviews.author: M. Kinne

customer_reviews.title: Great solution for small kitchens
customer_reviews.text: I have a small kitchenette in my basement that I didn't have the room for an under the counter dish washer. So I ordered this. It is the perfect fit! Perfect for homes that don't have the plumbing for a dishwasher, but have spare counter space. A note of warning though, it is bigger than expected. When it was shipped to me, I had to go to the post office to pick it up because they couldn't just deliver it in one of the little mail trucks. So...UPS anyone? It's also quite heavy, a little over 50 lbs with all of the shipping material. (To be expected as it IS a dishwasher!)
customer_reviews.author: Keltracks

customer_reviews.title: Overall awesome, issue with soap dispenser.
customer_reviews.text: Extremely easy to install, light enough for me to lift onto the counter, only issue is sometimes the soap dispenser doesn't allow the detergent to come all the way out, I've had to rerun it 3 times once because the soap was not dissolving, and that it arrived with the utensil basket broken. The cycles seem a little long but for the most part get the dishes clean, and saves me from washing them. So I'm pretty happy with this. There's me and 2 young kids, and it can hold up to 3 days worth of dishes from us, it's very convenient, I'm glad I got it.
customer_reviews.author: Kaytlynne

customer_reviews.title: Makes Cleaning A Breeze
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grandmother who does not own a dishwasher and has been hand washing dishes for years. Let me tell you, this was a GREAT investment for her! I helped her set it up and use it and it works exactly as we hopes it would! She lives by herself so really, this is the perfect size for the amount of dishes she uses. Its fairly quiet as compared to other dishwashers as well. Either that or mine at home is just loud (LOL). If youre looking for something for a high efficiency space or for someone without a dishwasher, this really is the perfect one!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: This was sooooo easy to install like 5 min. And the hose pops off it's mount so you don't have to leave it on your faucet. Make sure you press the red button and clear the hose before you disconnect though. The unit cleans very well but don't over fill.
customer_reviews.author: Barb G

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a small place
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these for rental units. The tenants love them. They hold the dishes of the day for one or two people. They are easy to use. You can unhook and hook them up easily. I did have to replace one of the faucets. I bought this one and it works great. VAPSINT 360 Degree Swivel Good Valued Modern Hot& Cold Mixer Stainless Steel Single Handle Brushed Steel Kitchen Sink Faucet
customer_reviews.author: kk

customer_reviews.title: I like it, and will keep it, but...
customer_reviews.text: This is great, it is what I was looking for. It cleans the dishes reasonably well, though I’ve had to re-wash some dishes here and there. But that’s expected with most dishwashers. The main issue I have with it is that when I unplug it from the faucet, water pours out of the hose. It’s bc it hasn’t fully emptied it out. I usually have to put the hose in a bowl on the ground to get it to discharge (most) of the water. I suspect if I place the dishwasher on a surface that is higher than the sink, it wouldn’t have this problem. With all that, I still chose to keep it just bc I HATE washing dishes!
customer_reviews.author: kikiT

customer_reviews.title: Works well. Make sure you use Teflon tape on ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Large plates need to be tilted, but if you organize it well and use the Cascade Platinum pods; it will clean everything. Installed under the counter next to the sink plumbing. Just cut the middle divider of the cabinet doors and removed the shelf, then slid inside. Fits well. Make sure you use Teflon tape on all the connections. Need to buy additional under the sink dishwasher connection kit of some kind to do that.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Vera

customer_reviews.title: Works really well!
customer_reviews.text: This product has worked really well for me. I’ve had it for a month and as long as you check your connections and don’t overtighten or undertighten the hoses it doesn’t leak or cause any problems. I love the sticker on the side (the picture attached). It made me chuckle! The only weird thing which has nothing to do with the function is the shipping. For some reason Amazon shipped this without my delivery address. Luckily FedEx called me to get my address. I didn’t detract any stars since the product works great.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry Anne

customer_reviews.title: Has delayed timer option! Don’t mistake it for
customer_reviews.text: Just ran it and it works great - saw a video from Claudia that made her think it didn’t work. I did what she did at first - I press the timer thinking that it meant it would WASH for 2 hours. Nope, the timer is if you want to delay it for 2,4,6 hours. All you have to do is hit what setting you want and the press start. No need to press the clock icon unless you want to delay the start time. I used cascade gel tablets and it dissolved and worked great. I’ve only used this one so far, no leaks but if anything changes over the next month or two I’ll update!
customer_reviews.author: Kimphy86

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working in 3 weeks, huge disappointment
customer_reviews.text: Waited over a year to buy this machine. This is the most expensive item i've ever bought on Amazon I am hoping hOmelabs does right by me and lets me return it so I can purchase a machine that actually works
customer_reviews.author: hippiemommie85

customer_reviews.title: Well, It Worked for Two Months
customer_reviews.text: I really want to like this dishwasher but I just can't recommend it to anyone anymore. It worked fine the first 2 months but now every time I go to do a load it will drain the water, beep, and flash the rinse symbol without doing anything. It's really disappointing because it's now outside the Amazon return window and I'm stuck with a $300 dishwasher that takes half my countertop and won't wash the dishes.
customer_reviews.author: Paul L

customer_reviews.title: this is amazing
customer_reviews.text: I hate dishes so my wife is stuck doing them so I got her this well the first one never showed up so I got refunded they I tried again this time it came she loves it the only problem is if you have square dishes like us they sit at a slant in the washer but it does our house wonderfully but like all dishwashers its a good idea to rinse the dish before putting it in
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Wilson

customer_reviews.title: A toughy but a goody!!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and hook up only problem was the adaptor was too small but that was cuz my sink isn’t normal it’s a hose only so had to take off spray head and connect adaptor with a small to large sided adaptor from Home Depot to make fit plus Teflon tape to help keep sealed and keep pressure and no leaks. Was a battle at first but it’s the best thing ever once all done.
customer_reviews.author: MasterMetroidX

customer_reviews.title: Hidden faucet adaptor in attach hose
customer_reviews.text: I think the install instructions could be slightly clearer. You do not need to purchase one of the faucet adaptors. Only after struggling to hook up the unit and ordering an additional adaptor from Amazon while I was trying once again to attach the hose did an adaptor just like the one I ordered literally fall out of the end of the hose. Lesson learned! Other than that I LOVE this little dishwasher. I wish I would have found it a year ago! It's quiet. It does a great job cleaning the dishes. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Magic

customer_reviews.title: I'm so happy with this decision! 😍
customer_reviews.text: I've had this dishwasher for over a year and love it. I use it every 1-2 days and haven't had any problems at all. I hand wash big stuff like pots and pans, but it easily fits a few days worth of plates, bowls, glasses, and silverware for two people. I run it at night when I go to bed or when I leave for work in the morning and have never had any problems with leaks. I even moved it from one apt to another. This was well worth the money and if it died tomorrow I'd get another one.
customer_reviews.author: mame

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little guy so much. Worth every penny! I work as a nurse and so washing my hands all day and then washing my dishes at home was killing my hands, so I got this little guy and he has saved my hands and time! My biggest concern was using the dishwasher pods. But I’ve just been putting him on the longest cycle and it’s been doing just fine. It has the same amount of power as a normal dishwasher just smaller. Perfect for a small apartment like mine.
customer_reviews.author: Carley

customer_reviews.title: One of my all time best purchases so far
customer_reviews.text: It cleans very well; if I open the door at the end of the cycle dishes come out almost dry when they’ve cooled. It’s a simple machine so there’s not a lot to say - came a day early, good assortment of cycles, clean and neat looking. Hook up was a snap. Some caution needed when tightening the plastic attachments to the machine - over or under tightening can lead to small leaks - happened to me only once, I made the adjustment, and it’s been perfect ever since. I’ve had this machine about 2 months and use it daily.
customer_reviews.author: L. Carlson

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS
customer_reviews.text: I hate, hate grocery shopping and washing dishes. I live in a small apt and thought I was just doomed to handwashing for the rest of my life. This machine is just fantastic. It works. It works well. It's attractive. It fits. The most important thing is it really does WORK. :D I just had to add this: The customer service for this product is outstanding! I had a small problem, caused by me and one quick call and the issue was immediately fixed. I just can't say enough about the product and the company. They have me as a lifelong customer. If you are debating? THIS IS THE MACHINE YOU WANT!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic addition to my kitchen
customer_reviews.text: The previous reviews are all true. I despise hand washing dishes. My husband claims to not hate it but prior to this purchase we always had dirty dishes in the sink. No more! This mighty little machine has made us both happy. It is just the two of us and we actually marvel over the sparkling dishes every time it finishes. Quiet and much more water friendly than hand washing. We run it at least once per day on a baking day ran it three time. Each load as clean as the first. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Angbwink

customer_reviews.title: Water/Suds overflow base and makes float-switch screw up the machine
customer_reviews.text: It worked fine twice, but now stops, beeps for 30 seconds, and blinks the Glass Icon. I was told this happens because too much water or suds overflow into the base. To fix it lift the right edge 4-5 inches off ground and let liquid drain out and this should release the float-switch and fix the issue. I followed these instructions but the machine still does this. I will try to keep this updated.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Freiling

customer_reviews.title: Soap dispensing door is blocked by utensil caddy!
customer_reviews.text: The soap dispensing door opens mid cycle. However, if you place the utensil caddy in its advertised position, it blocks the small soap door from opening. By moving the caddy to ensure the soap door opens, you lose a ton of space. It is not designed well to dispense soap while utilizing the space. I have also noticed over time, things are not getting as clean. I am not happy w the design of the storage rack, cutlery caddy or how the soap is dispensed. Also, the provided hardware for modifying standard faucet hookup is cheaply made. It leaks. Be prepared to buy proper fittings somewhere else. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: C. Jones

customer_reviews.title: One of the greatest purchases I've ever made
customer_reviews.text: Dishwasher came very well packaged, no dents or dings. We built a shelf in an empty cabinet box for it to live in, under the level of the counter - because of the dishwasher's built in pump, the waste water has no trouble draining into the sink. I've run a half dozen loads since installing yesterday and it performs better than our previous budget full size washer. Rinse aid does help the drying process. Overall it is very quiet and easy to use/install. If you have a newer faucet, you may need an adapter. After hand-washing for the last 6 months during our diy home reno, this is a life saver. So thrilled.
customer_reviews.author: Sara B.

customer_reviews.title: Don't hesitate to buy:)
customer_reviews.text: I looked and looked at dish washers and spent days making a decision. I really like this dishwasher. I hate washing dishes by hand and with this I am not spending an hour over a hot sink getting dry hands. My dishes come out clean and sterile. I put some of my grand daughters pacifiers and toys in it and I know they are clean. I only have to use one detergent tablet and my dishes are done in about a half an hour.
customer_reviews.author: Judi Q

customer_reviews.title: Great for RVs! 10 months in and no problems!
customer_reviews.text: We are full time RVers and this dishwasher is the best. It takes up very little space and has a great eco mode for when we are dry camping that uses only a few gallons of water. We mounted this on top of our washing machine and plumbed it in together. The wife loves how well it cleans and how large the inside is. There's nothing we own that can't fit in there, ie: water pitchers, instant pot, very large mixing bowls.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t recommend!
customer_reviews.text: So far this thing has been a nightmare! As you can see by the pic, we can’t use it! If you have a faucet that can’t be hooked up to this thing I don’t recommend this product. We had a water supply installed for it and we can’t find the correct pieces anywhere to get it up and working. The measures are incorrect. I’m a plumber so I should be able to get this thing working so from a professional opinion, beware!
customer_reviews.author: John Onesky

customer_reviews.title: Cleans well
customer_reviews.text: Made an adapter for my pull out faucet. Cost 5$ at the hardware store. Works great. Its small and takes a bit to arrange everything. I really dislike the silverware tray. It has doors on top with different shaped holes. My silverware doesnt fit in any of them. Other than that it is fanrastic
customer_reviews.author: I am a GeekTop Contributor: BBQ Styles

customer_reviews.title: Needs cleaned also, but works well
customer_reviews.text: So far it's a pretty good dishwasher, exactly the same as any full sized base model, just smaller. Only time will tell its true quality, but after a few weeks it has taken everything I've thrown at it. It actually cleans better than some dishwashers I've had as part of a kitchen in other apartments. The only annoying part is that all the filters and traps need cleaned regularly. But that's just a minor annoyance compared to all the time it's saved me.
customer_reviews.author: Zacc

customer_reviews.title: Thank you for making this product!!!
customer_reviews.text: This homelabs dishwasher is fantastic. I have been using it for a while now and it runs like a champ. The interior size is rather large, I can get my instant pot liner in it and have enough room for a few bowls and cups. My largest plates just barely fit, I do have to lean them just a tiny bit but it is possible to get them in there, and it does clean them. Would recommend, would buy again. It is a tiny bit noisy, but I live alone so I just start it when I leave for the day.
customer_reviews.author: James M.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect dishwasher! Washes 3 days worth of dirty dishes & regular Dollar tree soap pods work perfectly! Couldn't ask for a better dishwasher. I'm super happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Karissaaaa❤️

customer_reviews.title: Too small for 1 person
customer_reviews.text: The dishwasher worked fine but I ended up returning it. The dishwasher was too small for my 10.6” dinner plates. I had to slide them in at an angle which wasted more space and I could put less inside. I cook a meal almost every other day and pack my lunch with Pyrex containers everyday. The dishwasher was enough for me to run every evening. But if I ever had guest over or skipped a day, the dishwasher wouldn’t fit my dishes. Amazon’s excellent customer service allowed me to return the dishwasher. I’m going to get the 18” SPT portable dishwasher once my refund has been processed.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole Pejoro

customer_reviews.title: Where have you been all my life???
customer_reviews.text: I'm 43 years old and I never had a dishwasher until this one: how did I ever survive without one?? I live alone but this could be used for a couple or even a small family. (probably not with teenagers because they store twenty seven dirty cups, eight dirty plates, and ten dirty bowls in their bedrooms until you complain and all that won't fit at once) It is large enough to fit the liner of a 6 qt instant pot along with the lid plus all my going and prep tools at once.
customer_reviews.author: John in Ohio

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase EVER.
customer_reviews.text: My life is bettre with this dishwasher. I can spend time doing the more important stuff. Its quiet, it's amazing, its the best purchase ever. Best part IT WAS EARLY. Not to mention the item was shipped in the most secure packaging you can imagine, so you can be happy that it wont be broken upon arrival.
customer_reviews.author: mariette

customer_reviews.title: I love it - my Mom hates it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I live with my elderly parents, and I did not want my mom standing at the sink and doing dishes anymore. Also, it hurts my back to stand at the sink and do dishes. She wants nothing to do with it and considers it an obtrusive eyesore on the counter. I LOVE IT! because it gets the dishes CLEAN and SANITIZED, it is very easy to use, remarkably quiet and spaceous, and portable. Yes Virginia, you CAN take it with you!
customer_reviews.author: SED

customer_reviews.title: Really Gets Them Clean, Great Use of Limited Space
customer_reviews.text: So happy with this purchase! We didn’t have a dishwasher at all before and getting one has cut down the kitchen cleaning process by at least half. I put the dishwasher through the test with all sorts of food stains and the only thing it didn’t get was caked on sticky rice. Amazing! Clever design on the inside makes use of the limited space. The washing process itself is quiet but the draining sound is sudden and scary lol so I can’t run it before bed but I don’t mind.
customer_reviews.author: Lennon Boswell

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME product!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea how I have lived before getting this dishwasher! When i decided i wanted a counter top dishwasher, I researched competitors, looked at reviews, etc. I am so glad I went with this one! I know it seems small but it can hold ALLOT! I am a single mother with teenage kids. I just love this dishwasher! Con: I had to find an adapter to fit to my sink. It wasnt really that difficult but I had hoped to use the dishwasher right away.
customer_reviews.author: QueenBee7

customer_reviews.title: Easy to hook up and surprisingly holds quite a bit
customer_reviews.text: What a blessing to have this in our little apartment. Easy to hook up and surprisingly holds quite a bit!!! Thinking of taking this little dishwasher in our travel trailer on our road trips giving us more time to have fun and not do dishes!! I would suggestfor every apartment and motor home dweller!!! It doesn't take up as much room as a portable dishwasher, in fact the counter space is the same as a dish drainer!!
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Leaking heavily from bottom
customer_reviews.text: Leaks heavily from the bottom and the glass icon blinks. I’ve tried to tilt the machine to fix it. It’s ruining my cabinetry and flooring. I’ve requested a refund/replacement. If a replacement works I will edit my review.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Norquist

customer_reviews.title: This little guy is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This little guy is awesome! When I opened the box, I could not believe how well it was packed inside. Right away I knew that this was a quality product. The setup was fast and easy. It has cleaned as well as any dishwasher that I have had. I didn’t rinse off some of the silverware, but those dudes came out just as clean!! The only problem I had was that I forgot to turn off the faucet after the first load!! Oh yeah, my window and I were wet after that!
customer_reviews.author: Ken Hagerty

customer_reviews.title: Works well when I don't have time to wash dishes ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well when I don't have time to wash dishes and thy build up in my sink. Fits the same as the top rack of a dish washer with a bit more head space. I can even fit the inner steel pot from my 6-quart Instant Pot in there. Gets the dishes clean though the drying function doesn't dry all that well.... I thought they were supposed to come out complete dry.
customer_reviews.author: Extremophile

customer_reviews.title: Cleans just as well as a full size.
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Cleans well. My only issue was with the quick connect. I contacted hOmelabs they actually sent me another dishwasher. I removed the quick disconnect, it worked much better, it still leaks but not like before. This is the only negative which is why I am not giving it 5 stars. Pretty quiet overall. I've cleaned pots and pans to dishes. It doesn't like the pods,so I am using granules. Again overall I am happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Ransom

customer_reviews.title: Pretty underwhelming, more of a sanitizer than a washer
customer_reviews.text: This thing really doesn't do a good job of washing,contrary to what a lot of people are saying. I have to basically fully hand wash everything first and it basically just acts as a sanitizer. I have to leave the soap dispenser open because if I close it like you're supposed to it doesn't actually use the soap. If you're one of those people that fully scrubs dishes before putting them in a washer then I guess it's for you, but just "rinsing" does not suffice, I can't trust it to get any bit of grim off.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: I'm in love with an appliance and I don't care who knows it!
customer_reviews.text: Do you hate doing dishes? Well I do. The chapped hands, stooped back, hours spent wasted... no more of that for me! I think this is one of the best purhases I have ever made. It fits a day of dishes for my family of three (minus large cooking dishes) and performs beautifully. Now, to be fair, I'm firmly in the pre-rinse your dishes camp so I can't speak to how it works for a heavily soiled dishes. I seriously love this thing so much I could cry. If you're on the fence - just buy it. Seriously. I should have done it years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Shane L.

customer_reviews.title: Works very well for being a compact unit.
customer_reviews.text: Works very well for the size. Easy enough to assemble. Light enough to move easily. I have run several loads of dishes so far with no issues. Even does a good job on silverware. The only con would be that the water hose adapter that comes with it is threaded for a standard size faucet. I have a junior size faucet so I had to find an adapter before I could attach it. Keep this in mind when purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Amon

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend - Key for domestic bliss
customer_reviews.text: Amazing - works like a charm for a 2-person household. We run it every 1-2 days. Takes a bit of getting used to how to best fit the dishes in it but all the dishes we used to fit in our full size dishwasher at our last place fit here. You need to open the door at some point after the cycle is done to help it dry but we use a drying agent and there are no drops on the dishes once they do dry. We needed to get a converter for our faucet (a couple of $ at hardware store) but then the outlet fit perfect and works like a charm. No leaks no complaints .
customer_reviews.author: M Harary

customer_reviews.title: So far so Great!
customer_reviews.text: Delivered today, great packaging installation in 10 minutes. I chose permanent install. A Dishwasher install kit purchased at Home Depot converts it to permanent instead of portable. Extremely quiet, cleans like a 1000.00 machine. If it lasts its a unbeatable purchase. So far its great!
customer_reviews.author: Tony Coppola

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as expected and more
customer_reviews.text: We have been using it for 2 weeks now and loving it. It is exactly what we expected in a counter top dishwasher. I read reviews of all the choices out there for each model. This one had the best reviews and price point. It was packaged to travel well and arrived with no damage. The packaging is designed to lift up and away, rather than having to lift the product out. Super simple to hook up. No leaking if set up correctly. When it is running, other than when the water is discharging, you can't even hear that it is running, just the little indicator light flashing. Would I buy another? Yes. Would I recommend this to friends? Absolutely.
customer_reviews.author: jc

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to install and was perfect to use for every ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item for my sister to use in her small apartment. She decided she didn't have a lot of countertop space for it so I took it to our vacation cabin. It was easy to install and was perfect to use for every day items such as plates and cups. It was larger than I anticipated, and unfortunately did not fit underneath the top cabinets, so it does stick out a bit. Dishes came out very clean. Overall, great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Roni J

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: The best customer service in the world!!!! Faye and other team members were extremely helpful and response received within a few hours. The dishwasher works well and not loud at all. The hose that came with the dishwasher needed to be lengthened for my setup. Only wish the fittings for the back were standardized to American fitting measurements. I have square shape plates and they fit when placed at an angle. I'm Very happy with dishwasher and the customer service is more than A+++. I recommend buying this dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: JesJohnnie

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install - Works very well!
customer_reviews.text: The included faucet adapter easily screws on and quick-connects to the dishwasher. That's it! Installed! Stainless steel interiors make cleanup a breeze. The built in heater works with any water source, and it sure can get HOT. Bought this as a secondary washer. I think this works better than my built-in Bosch full size dishwasher!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Hazelett

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: It’s been over a decade since I had a dishwasher and this has been a game changer. Very easy to install and works great. I highly recommend this product if you live someplace without a dishwasher and are fed up with doing the dishes.
customer_reviews.author: Publisher1

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed on how well this cleans my dishes. However, 2 things I don't like about this. One, there is no where to put the faucet drain and the power cord. Two, the adapter that you have to put on your faucet, in order for it to hook up, sprays water very fast out of the of the faucet when not using the hook up. So if I want to wash really big pots and pans or my hands, I can't put it on full blast or it sprays water everywhere. But, overall happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: I wish I would have bought this dishwasher years and years ago
customer_reviews.text: I reviewed all kinds of different compact dishwashers on Amazon I finally decided on this one and I am not disappointed. It's quiet it connects very easily and it does a heck of a job on dishes. What's really impressive is I use dishwasher tablets finish Powerball quantum and I have no issue with soap buildup in the dispenser I've included a video where I show what the dishes look like after a 75-minute economy setting.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Revised review
customer_reviews.text: I wrote a pretty negative review after owning the machine for a month because it kept leaking.... This problem was resolved with a new hose connection. Then last week, it stopped working completely (after about 8 months). I contacted HomeLabs and they are sendung me a whole new machine! I would work with this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Ann Clark

customer_reviews.title: Super quiet, cleans even nasty dishes perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: Everything about the packaging was fine. No damage whatsoever. However, the unit was pinched in the back upper corner and part of the plastic facing is cracked, plus the casing is uneven, probably because of that. The description states that there is rinse aid in the box: there wasn't. Overall, it arrived quickly, was very easy to hook up (take the rings out of the adapter to find female threads), and it's super quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Nunya

customer_reviews.title: very pleased except for ine thing
customer_reviews.text: super easy to install, literally, hook the hose to the faucet, and you're done. it has great cleaning power , got rid of all the pasta sauce, and broccoli, only problem is our plates dont really fit, we have to do a good amount of careful tetris to make everything fit, it seems like standard circumference plates are just a little too tall for the nachine, and you have to lean them on an angle to make sure they dont bang into the top of the machine when ypu slide the rack in. but mostly very pleased with the machine
customer_reviews.author: E. Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I have had this dishwasher for 10 months now in my tiny house. It was easy to install. It is very quiet when washing. About 75% of the time the load is not fully dried. After a couple of months I found that the loads were not washing very good or left a film on the dishes. I did find that switching from tablet detergent to liquid helped, using less detergent. When washing plates or bowls, I use the longer cycle for a better wash. Overall, a well priced wash machine that works good and is very quiet. I haven’t had any issues with water leaking or mechanical issues.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: No brainer for single folks
customer_reviews.text: I live by myself with my daughter half the time and this was the perfect solution to not washing by hand. I've had it for a few months now and absolutely no problems and cleans exceptionally well. I find it helps if you don't skimp on the detergent and rinse agent. Easy to hook up and disconnect. One hose assembly for water input and output. I wish I bought it years ago!
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Works fine, but the wash performance falls behind traditional dishwashers.
customer_reviews.text: Works fine... If you're used to the performance of a traditional washer, this will disappoint. The wash/built-in heater doesn't get as hot and the water pressure for the jets are clearly weaker than most traditional washers. You pretty much have to rinse the dishes, and if there's hard, caked-on food, the dishes will come out dirty. All things considered, it's probably worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: 16vjohn

customer_reviews.title: Excellent machine!
customer_reviews.text: I just love this. Easy to use. Holds a lot more than I expected and everything comes out looking like I just bought it new. No leaking anywhere. I'm truly impressed. I was not expecting the same quality as a full size. I was so happy with it my mom and my neighbor each went and got themselves one as well.
customer_reviews.author: LoriMac

customer_reviews.title: Because it's so quiet, when it pushes out wash water, be ready for the sudden noise
customer_reviews.text: Some reviews i saw said no adapters, but mine came with a quick connect faucet adapter that works on both Male and female threaded faucet heads, you can find the female threads if you remove the extra rubber washer. Slightly bigger than what i imagined based on pictures, but that's not a bad thing. Extremely quiet, except during drainage activity, when wash water is ejected out the bottom of the faucet connector. I will be converting it to be an in cabinet model for my RV, and it's the perfect size for it.
customer_reviews.author: Leland A

customer_reviews.title: Leaky dishwasher
customer_reviews.text: Keeps flooding water everywhere, ends up being more work to mop gross dish water off the floor than it is to do the dishes by hand. I DO NOT recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Matt E.

customer_reviews.title: Quiet
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this for a couple of weeks and used it several times. It is extremely quiet, my office is about 8feet from it and it is not heard by other people when I’m on a call. It seems to clean the dishes well. I don’t mind the whole doesn’t totally the dry dishes, I’m fine with air drying. Even though the dimensions and weight are given, I was still surprised by the size/weight. But that’s on me, not the mfg, their info was accurate and the IKEA Bror cart works to hold it. Adapter fit on the faucet with no problem and there have not been any leaks. I’m pleased to not have to hand wash dishes any longer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best thing for single dudes
customer_reviews.text: Dude. Let me start off with im a mid 20s single dude that doing dishes was they worst thing in the world. I would rather clean toilets than dishes. I also work 15 hour shifts 5 days a week so dirty dishes will sit around my house sometimes up to a week. Yes i know thats gross but this thing doesnt even care how stuck on it is. I have never prewashed only had 1 pot that i had to wash 2 times but it was really bad so kinda my fault. Hooked up and working 20 minutes after i got it. If you dont have a dishwasher and need one. Like what are you waiting for.
customer_reviews.author: Elias Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money and time
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't dry my dishes at all. Support was no help. If I want a new one, I will have to ship this to them, wait for a refund, and then purchase a new one. There are no local stores around me that sell compact dishwashers. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer

product_meta.title: hOmeLabs Compact Countertop Dishwasher - Energy Star Portable Mini Dish Washer in Stainless Steel Interior for Small Apartment Office and Home Kitchen with 6 Place Setting Rack and Silverware Basket
feature_bullets: CLEANS AS YOU GO - A convenient and small Energy Star certified dish washing machine for cleaning the dishes after dinner or cooking. Simply load the dishes in the dish basket and cutlery rack and let this white dishwasher do the dirty job. Easily sits on countertops or tabletop requiring less space

USER FRIENDLY CONTROLS - With simple to use control panel and light indicators. Program selector has 6 wash cycle options: heavy, normal, ECO, glass, speed, and rinse for your different dishwashing needs. Delay button light to postpone wash cycle

NO TOOLS REQUIRED - Features a quick connect assembly with accessories including inlet and drain hose and a faucet adapter for water lines that are compatible with round-shaped faucet outlets with removable aerators, and 55/64"-27 male or 15/16"-27 female threads underneath

STREAK-FREE DISHES - Using the rinse aid dispenser, you can dry your plates, mugs, and glass quickly without the marks or streaks. Only use rinse aids designed for an automatic dishwasher to prevent damaging your dishwasher. An indicator light will let you know when to refill the dispenser

COMPACT FOR SMALL KITCHENS - This counter top appliance measures 17.2 x 19.6 x 21.6 inches with 6 standard place setting capacity perfect for small size household or individuals living in apartments with limited space for huge kitchen appliances

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars1,359 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
